/*

1 eth = 1000000000000000000 / 2
0.5 = 500000000000000000 / 2
0.25 = 250000000000000000 / 2
0.125 = 125000000000000000 / 2
0.0625 = 62500000000000000 / 2
0.03125 = 31250000000000000 / 2
0.015625 = 15625000000000000


1 HEAL = 0.001
1000 HEAL = 1 Ether

1 Ether = 10000 HEAL = 1/1000 HEAL
0.0001 ETHER = 1 HEAL

1 * 10 ** 18 wei = 1000 HEAL


1 eth = 10000 = 1/10000 = 0.0001 ETH = 1 HEAL
0.0001 * (10 ** 18) = 1 HEAL(10 ** 5)
100000000000000 wei =  1 HEAL(10 ** 5 HEALBITS)

100000000000000 wei = 100000 HEAL BITS


*/
